00018 struct readout_module s500_module = {
00019   NULL,                 // init
00020   NULL,                 // exit

00031 #define N_CH_S500 6
00032 
00033 struct s500 {
00034   BOOL enabled;
00035   int crate;
00036   int slot;
00037   char odb_name[20];
00038   DWORD acum[N_CH_S500];
00039 };
00040 
00041 #define MAX_S500 8
00042 struct s500 s500[MAX_S500];
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * s500_bor1
00046  *
00047  * Initialize one S500 module.
00048  */
00049 INT s500_bor1(struct s500 *s500)
00050 {
00051   // Get the VME base address of the module
00052   s500->crate = odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/Crate",
00053                     crate_number, s500->odb_name);
00054   s500->slot = odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/Slot",
00055                     crate_number, s500->odb_name);
00056 
00057   // clear all channels
00058   for(int i = 0; i < N_CH_S500; i++) {
00059     camo(s500->crate, s500->slot, i, 9, 0);
00060   }
00061 
00062   // clear the accumulated values
00063   for(int i = 0; i < N_CH_S500; i++) {
00064     s500->acum[i] = 0;
00065   }
00066                                                                                 
00067   return SUCCESS;
00068 }
00069                                                                                 
00070 /*
00071  * s500_bor
00072  *
00073  * Called at the beginning of the run to discover S500 modules
00074  * and initialize them.
00075  */
00076 INT s500_bor()
00077 {
00078   // Use the ODB to find any S500 modules
00079   for(int j = 0; j < MAX_S500; j++) {
00080  
00081     bool enabled = false;
00082                                                                                 
00083     if (odb_find_key("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/S500 %d", crate_number, j)) {
00084       diag_print(1, "ODB says S500 %d is present, ", j);
00085       enabled =
00086         odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/S500 %d/enabled status",
00087             crate_number, j);
00088       if (enabled) {
00089         diag_print(1, "and is enabled.  Initializing...\n");
00090       } else {
00091         diag_print(1, "but is disabled.\n");
00092       }
00093     }
00094                                                                                 
00095     s500[j].enabled = enabled;
00096                                                                                 
00097     // Set up the name of the MIDAS bank associated with the module
00098     sprintf(s500[j].odb_name, "S500 %d", j);
00099                                                                                 
00100     if(enabled) {
00101       s500_bor1(&s500[j]);
00102     }
00103   }
00104 
00105   return SUCCESS;
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*
00109  * s500_read
00110  *
00111  * Called at the end of a block to assemble data from that block into a 
00112  * MIDAS event.
00113  */
00114 INT s500_read(char *pevent)
00115 {
00116   DWORD *pdata;
00117 
00118   // first fill in the raw values
00119   bk_create(pevent, "S500", TID_DWORD, &pdata);
00120   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_S500; i++) {
00121     if(s500[i].enabled) {
00122       for(int j = 0; j < N_CH_S500; j++) {
00123         DWORD val;
00124         cam24i(s500[i].crate, s500[i].slot, j, 2, &val);
00125         *pdata++ = val;
00126         s500[i].acum[j] += val; 
00127       }
00128     }
00129   }
00130   bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00131 
00132   // now the accumulated values
00133   bk_create(pevent, "ACUM", TID_DWORD, &pdata);
00134   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_S500; i++) {
00135     if(s500[i].enabled) {
00136       for(int j = 0; j < N_CH_S500; j++) {
00137         *pdata++ = s500[i].acum[j];
00138       }
00139     }
00140   }
00141   bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00142 
00143   return SUCCESS;
00144 }
